Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The name of the computer.
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Unique ID for the microsoft monitoring agent installed on the server.
Columns.Name: AgentId

Columns.Description: AgentId with m- prepended.
Columns.Name: Machine

Columns.Description: The display name of the server.
Columns.Name: DisplayName

Columns.Description: The full display name of the server.
Columns.Name: FullDisplayName

Columns.Description: The host name of the server without domain.
Columns.Name: HostName

Columns.Description: The boot time in UTC
Columns.Name: BootTime

Columns.Description: The UTC timezone offset of the server.
Columns.Name: TimeZone

Columns.Description: Values will be Unknown Physical Virtual or Hypervisor
Columns.Name: VirtualizationState

Columns.Description: A list of the server's IPv4 addresses
Columns.Name: Ipv4Addresses

Columns.Description: A list of the server's IPv4 subnet masks.
Columns.Name: Ipv4SubnetMasks

Columns.Description: A list of the server's IPv4 default gateways.
Columns.Name: Ipv4DefaultGateways

Columns.Description: A list of the server's IPv6 addresses
Columns.Name: Ipv6Addresses

Columns.Description: A list of the server's MAC addresses
Columns.Name: MacAddresses

Columns.Description: An array of DNS names
Columns.Name: DnsNames

Columns.Description: The version number of the dependency agent on the server.
Columns.Name: DependencyAgentVersion

Columns.Description: Value will be windows or linux
Columns.Name: OperatingSystemFamily

Columns.Description: The full name of the operating system
Columns.Name: OperatingSystemFullName

Columns.Description: The physical memory in MB
Columns.Name: PhysicalMemoryMB

Columns.Description: The number of CPUs
Columns.Name: Cpus

Columns.Description: The CPU speed in MHz
Columns.Name: CpuSpeed

Columns.Description: hyperv vmware xen and so on
Columns.Name: VirtualMachineType

Columns.Description: The native id of the server.
Columns.Name: VirtualMachineNativeId

Columns.Description: The name of the VM
Columns.Name: VirtualMachineNativeName

Columns.Description: The hypervisor id of the server.
Columns.Name: VirtualMachineHypervisorId

Columns.Description: The hypervisor type of the server.
Columns.Name: HypervisorType

Columns.Description: The hypervisor id of the server.
Columns.Name: HypervisorId

Columns.Description: The hosting provider for the server
Columns.Name: HostingProvider

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The resource group for the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureResourceGroup

Columns.Description: The Azure name for the resource.
Columns.Name: AzureResourceName

Columns.Description: The location of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureLocation

Columns.Description: The update domain of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureUpdateDomain

Columns.Description: The fault domain for the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureFaultDomain

Columns.Description: The Azure ID of the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureVmId

Columns.Description: The size of the Azure VM.ï¿½Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureSize

Columns.Description: The publisher of the VM image used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureImagePublisher

Columns.Description: The description of the image used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureImageOffering

Columns.Description: The sku for the VM image used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureImageSku

Columns.Description: The image version used on the server. Only available for Azure VMs and VMSS instances.
Columns.Name: AzureImageVersion

Columns.Description: For cloud services the service name of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureCloudServiceName

Columns.Description: For cloud services the deployment id of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureCloudServiceDeployment

Columns.Description: For cloud services the role name of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureCloudServiceRoleName

Columns.Description: For cloud services the role type of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureCloudServiceRoleType

Columns.Description: For cloud services the instance name of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureCloudServiceInstanceId

Columns.Description: For scale sets the name of the scale set.
Columns.Name: AzureVmScaleSetName

Columns.Description: For scale sets the deployment id of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureVmScaleSetDeployment

Columns.Description: For scale sets the resource id of the scale set.
Columns.Name: AzureVmScaleSetResourceId

Columns.Description: For scale sets the instance id of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureVmScaleSetInstanceId

Columns.Description: For service fabric clusters the cluster id of the server.
Columns.Name: AzureServiceFabricClusterId

Columns.Description: For service fabric clusters the cluster name.
Columns.Name: AzureServiceFabricClusterName

Columns.Description: The source of the data collected (Insights)
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
